snippet.title: 🅱️IKMIN 269 DX || MOD RELEASE
snippet.description:
Bikmin 269 DX is a full game mod of Pikmin 2 with a brand new story, and all new areas! Yes, every area is new and fully modeled! This isn't just a "repaint" of Pikmin 2, it contains a new story with characters from a parallel Pikmin universe where many things are strange, a little bit memey, or just not correct. With over 130 new treasures to collect and brand new mechanics to make the game feel fresh this mod is essentially a new game. This mod is not meant to be taken too seriously in most aspects, but its gameplay is meant to be fresh and creative for fans of the Pikmin series to enjoy even if they don't care about the memes.

For more information on how to set up the mod and play it you can read the included "README.txt" file.

If you have any questions, or concerns then please join this discord server and ask for help!
Link: https://discord.gg/q9kWEe7TBd

Mod Download Link: https://gamebanana.com/mods/550318

Link to Original Mod Trailer: https://youtu.be/nMcSHx_HiiQ?si=PmxAlaBwaue4oQ8V
